body: Hi all, i was wondering if it's possible to calculate the Uniform sky factor as Radiance analysis result (like Ecotect Data options provides): [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KzOvBNTGFEF*Jqmf0NjmDekKguGaZTmEmBHVAD8QuOyhDYsxn*OaLteWzH6HBceCHNsL9Cw1cKBM2JRKom0rA1eCAZeuY-Ju/Catturadischermata9.jpg)Thank you in advance!
topic: It's possible to run Radiance analysis to obtain uniform Sky factor?
